casebody.data:
[Merrimack,

June, 1883.] Seavey v. Drake & a., Ex’rs. In Equity. Reported 62 N. H. 393. Facts found by the court. O. B. Sanborn and J. Y. Mugridge, for the plaintiff. W. L. Foster and S. Dana, for the defendants. Stanley, J.

The facts found at the trial are such as were held sufficient (in 62 N. H. 393) to maintain the action.

Decree for the plaintiff.

Allen, J., did not sit: the others concurred.
